```{r cars}
library(tidyverse)
rm(list=ls())

if(TRUE){
  all_dt <- do.call(rbind, lapply(list.files(".", pattern = "*.csv"), function(path){
    parts <- strsplit(path, "_", fixed=TRUE)[[1]]
    read_csv(path) %>% mutate(inp_type = sprintf("%s_%s", parts[1], parts[3]))
  })) %>% mutate(dist = res - idx) %>% select(method, dist, time_micro, inp_type)
  saveRDS(all_dt, "all_data.rds")
} else {
  all_dt <- readRDS("all_data.rds")
}


ggplot(all_dt %>% filter(dist < 500) %>% group_by(dist, method, inp_type) %>% summarise(time_micro = mean(time_micro)), aes(dist, time_micro, color=method)) + geom_smooth(method="loess", span=0.05, aes(fill=method)) + facet_wrap(~inp_type)

ggplot(all_dt %>% filter(dist < 2000) %>% group_by(dist, method, inp_type) %>% summarise(time_micro = mean(time_micro)), aes(dist, time_micro, color=method)) + geom_smooth(method="loess", span=0.05, aes(fill=method)) + facet_wrap(~inp_type)

#ggplot(all_dt %>% group_by(dist, method, inp_type) %>% summarise(time_micro = mean(time_micro)), aes(dist, time_micro, color=method)) + geom_smooth(method="loess", span=0.05, aes(fill=method)) + facet_wrap(~inp_type)


sdd <- all_dt %>% filter(dist < 150) %>% group_by(dist, method, inp_type) %>% summarise(time_avg = mean(time_micro), time_sd = sd(time_micro))
ggplot(data=sdd, aes(x=dist, y=time_avg, colour=method)) + geom_line() + geom_ribbon(aes(ymin=time_avg - time_sd, ymax=time_avg + time_sd, fill=method), linetype=0, alpha=0.1) + facet_wrap(~inp_type, scales = "free_y")
```
